field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable the user account.

field.label: Username
field.help: Set the unique username for the user. Allowed characters are 0-9, a-z, A-Z, and ._-@/:

field.label: Password
field.help: Set the password for the user. Allowed characters are 0-9, a-z, A-Z, and ,._-!$%/()+#=: with up to 128 characters.

field.label: Password Encryption
field.help:
Set encryption or hash for stored password.
Cleartext-Password The password will be stored in plaintext. This may be less secure than alternatives. Works with all RADIUS authentication protocols.
NT-Password (pre-hashed) An NT hash of the password will be stored. First the NT hash of the password should be generated; this will be a string such as 469DCB69D4A58A5F29272787713D96F8. Then the hash (not the password) should be entered into the password field above. A command such as smbencrypt secret123 may be used to generate the pre-hashed NT Password. Works with the following RADIUS authentication protocols: PEAP, EAP-MSCHAPv2, EAP-GTC, PAP, MS-CHAP, Cisco LEAP.

field.label: Description
field.help: Given name, last name, or anything you need to describe.

field.label: IP Address
field.help: Set the IP address the user should receive.

field.label: Subnetmask
field.help: Subnet to receive, e.g. 255.255.255.0

field.label: Routes
field.help: Add routes in CIDR notation, e.g. 192.168.2.0/24. Multiple entries are allowed

field.label: IPv6 Address
field.help: Set the IPv6 address the user should receive.

field.label: VLAN ID
field.help: VLAN ID the user receives, e.g. for 802.1X. Leave empty if you don't know what it is.

field.label: Login-Time
field.help: With this option you can set a time frame how long the user is allowed to be logged in.

field.label: Simultaneous-Use
field.help: Set how many times one account is allowed to login at the same time.

field.label: EXOS VLAN Untagged
field.help: Set exos vlan untagged

field.label: EXOS VLAN Tagged list
field.help: Set exos vlan tagged

field.label: EXOS policy
field.help: Set exos policy filter id with Filter-ID="Entrasys:version=1:mgmt=su:policy=[policy_name]"

field.label: WISPr Bandwith Min UP
field.help: Set the minimum upload bandwith for WISPr attribute. The value is treated as bits/s.

field.label: WISPr Bandwith Max UP
field.help: Set the maximum upload bandwith for WISPr attribute. The value is treated as bits/s.

field.label: WISPr Bandwith Min DOWN
field.help: Set the minimum download bandwith for WISPr attribute. The value is treated as bits/s.

field.label: WISPr Bandwith Max DOWN
field.help: Set the maximum download bandwith for WISPr attribute. The value is treated as bits/s.

field.label: ChilliSpot Bandwith Max UP
field.help: Set the maximum upload bandwith for ChilliSpot attribute. The value is treated as kbits/s.

field.label: ChilliSpot Bandwith Max DOWN
field.help: Set the maximum download bandwith for ChilliSpot attribute. The value is treated as kbits/s.

field.label: Mikrotik VLAN ID
field.help: Set the Mikrotik VLAN ID attribute. Mikrotik uses own attributes for VLAN assignment.

field.label: Mikrotik VLAN Type
field.help: Set the Mikrotik VLAN type attribute. For general use a value of 0 is fine.

field.label: Max Daily Session
field.help: Set the maximum session limit in seconds. This can be used by the Captive Portal.

field.label: Service Type
field.help: Set the Service-Type attributes for this user.

field.label: AVPair
field.help: Select the configured AVPairs for this user.
